segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink overflowing like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's just gushing out, and that woman is oblivious, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her apron on, acting all domestic, but ignoring the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's spreading everywhere, gonna ruin the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, sneaking cookies behind her backâ€”what a sneaky move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, about to topple over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just egging him on, reaching up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in the jar look tempting, but this is no way to get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman should turn around and stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice yard, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not hearing the water splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
